name: ElectriClick
description: In this incremental game, you own a electricity company. Your goal is to become as succesful as possible. To produce electricity, you must buy generators. The first generators produce electricity, and the second generators produce first generators and so on. Eventually you will sell your company for one dollar. This happens at 1 to the power of 100 of 1e100 watts of electricity. You can then buy upgrades with this money.
